title: Salted Pork Fried Rice
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1/2 yellow pepper, finely chopped', '1 stick Chinese celery, leaves discarded and chopped into 1cm pieces', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '400g cold cooked rice, grains separated', '100g cooked Chinese preserved salted pork, finely diced', 'monosodium glutamate (MSG) to taste']
